CustomField.description: Used to identify referrals submitted by the referring rep from Payroll to HR Services where the Account is or is not a Paychex Client at the time the referral is submitted.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND((CONTAINS(Referral_Type__c, "Internal Referral")|| CONTAINS(Referral_Type__c, "Integrated Selling")) , (CONTAINS(Referring_User_Sales_Org__c,"PAY")||CONTAINS(Referring_User_Sales_Org__c,"MMS")), CONTAINS(Referral_Partner__r.Name,"PAS") ) , IF( (ISBLANK(Account__r.First_Run_Date__c)||(Account__r.First_Run_Date__c > DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) )) ,1,0) ,0)
CustomField.label: Integrated Selling
